Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at  75th/King Drive to Champlain
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rerouted via 75th, King Dr, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage nr 75th/King Dr to Champlain

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive to Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC-Halsted due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
